name: Electromagnetism (Plusha's studio)
description:
This game was made for Trijam #189 for a theme "Push and pull".

This game is based on the power of the electromagnetism. That's a platformer with magnets. Their charge can be or positive, or negative. Player can change his charge (positive/negative too). In real-life the objects with the same charges push off, and with different - pull in. I have made that in this game.

Controls:

A/D - walking

Space - jump

Q - change your charge (blue nail - negative, red nail - positive).

I have streamed the process of making this game here: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=TVGaAbPE6Cs
